actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Commission on Food Production, Processing, Marketing, and Pricing to study the food industry from the producer to the consumer.

summary.text: Establishes a 15 member National Commission on Food Production, Processing, Marketing and Pricing. Requires the Commission to study, appraise, and report to the President and Congress on the economic and industrial structure of all segments of the food industry. Requires the Federal Trade Commission, the Department of Justice, and the Department of Agriculture to publish separate reports with respect to the enforcement of antitrust laws on the various sectors of the food industry.

titles.title: A bill to establish a National Commission on Food Production, Processing, Marketing, and Pricing to study the food industry from the producer to the consumer.
